__e: And that's why I'm so disappointed and...

What do you mean, none of you sell drugs?
You once asked if you disappoint me.
So how can I be disappointed in you when I find myself struggling with the same thing?
And I am disappointed that you even thought of that at all!
I've been disappointed in him for being like me.
I have never been more disappointed in anyone in my life.

I really don't like having you disappointed in me.
